subject: Business
title: Empathy as a Strategic Tool
description: Learn Empathy as a Strategic Tool in one minute.

hook.text: Your landlord won't budge on rent. Then you say: 'I imagine it's tough with rising maintenance costs.'

buildup.text: Tactical empathy means understanding the other side's perspective to influence their behavior.

discovery.text: It's not agreeing with them. It's showing you understand their situation â€” which makes them more flexible.

twist.text: People resist negotiators who argue. But they can't resist someone who genuinely understands them.

climax.text: Chris Voss says empathy isn't weakness in negotiation. It's the most disarming weapon you have.

punchline.text: Understand their world. Then reshape the deal inside it.

quiz.question: What is tactical empathy?
options: Understanding the other side's perspective to influence their behavior
Agreeing with everything the other side says
Feeling sorry for the other party
